title: Poppy Frenzy in California, Trump vs. George Conway & Women’s Innovations That Men Love | Will Hurd
itunes:title: Poppy Frenzy in California, Trump vs. George Conway & Women’s Innovations That Men Love | Will Hurd
description:
President Trump attacks the late John McCain and longtime critic George Conway, Desi Lydic sheds light on women's innovations, and Texas GOP Rep. Will Hurd chats with Trevor.
